      • Circle

        public Circle(int topLeftX,
              int topLeftY,
              int radius,
              java.awt.Color color,
              java.awt.Graphics2D canvas)
        Parameters:
        topLeftX - the x coordinate of the top left of the circle
        topLeftY - the y coordinate of the top left of the circle
        radius - the radius of the circle
        color - the color that the circle will be drawn
        canvas - the canvas to draw the circle on
